text: The Districts of Hungary (Hungarian: járások) are the second-level divisions of Hungary after counties. In total, there are 174 districts in Hungary and in the 19 counties, and there are 23 districts in Budapest. == By county == === Baranya County === Baranya County No. District District seat Area (km)
